body_html:
I believe this is a Windows-specific problem, and I think the solution is to wrap your code in if __name__ == '__main__':, as mentioned in the error message that you showed us.
More info in this thread https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33038209/python-multiprocessing-fails-for-example-code

I'm closing the issue, feel free to comment if this doesn't solve the problem for you

body:
I believe this is a Windows-specific problem, and I think the solution is to wrap your code in `if __name__ == '__main__':`, as mentioned in the error message that you showed us.
More info in this thread https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33038209/python-multiprocessing-fails-for-example-code

I'm closing the issue, feel free to comment if this doesn't solve the problem for you
